speaker: giffany
dialog: Heyaaaa! Ooh you're looking great today, you do something with your hair?

speaker: giffany
dialog: Yes? No? Eh, you look cute regardless, ahaha! Anywayyys, welcome to your first minigame!

speaker: giffany
dialog: It's simple! For this demo, all you gotta do is use the left and right arrows to control the cart, and make sure you collect as many of my hearts as possible!

speaker: giffany
dialog: I really like you, so don't disappoint me like everyone else! haha~
